chunk:
Dr. Bronner's 4-in-1 Organic Sugar Soap, Peppermint

Brand: Dr. Bronner's

Category: Body Wash/Cleanser

Ingredients: Sucrose, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Juice, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Kernel Oil, Potassium Hydroxide, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil,
s (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Oil, Acacia Concinna (Shikakai) Fruit Powder, Citric Acid, Tocopherol, Limonene
